name: Marley
info: She doesn’t speak much and seems mysterious, but she simply doesn’t like to talk and is really a Trainer with a kind heart who cares about both people and Pokémon.

moves.name: Flame Wheel
moves.effect: Removes the frozen condition from the user. Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: X Speed All
moves.effect: Raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: We’re Standing Strong!
moves.effect: Applies the Status Condition Defense effect to the allied field of play. Removes all status conditions from all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

syncMove.name: Grateful Friend Flare Blitz
syncMove.description: The more the user’s Speed has been raised, the greater the power of this move.
